translation: There is nothing in the three worlds, O Arjuna, that needs to be done by Me, nor is there anything unattained that needs to be attained; yet I engage Myself in action.
commentary: 3.22 Not not? Me my? Partha O Partha? Is there is? kartvyam to be done (duty)? in the three in the three? In the worlds worlds? Something anything? Not not? unattained unattained? to be attained to be attained? Behave am? Eve also? f and? Karmani in action.Commentary I am the Lord of the universe and therefore I have no personal grounds to engage. Myself in action. I have nothing to achieve as I have all divine wealth? as the
